name: Eternal Winter
detailed_description:
The main objective in Eternal Winter is to lead an expedition and collect data about this inhospitable island and its ecosystem.

​you will need to face all kind of challenges imposed by Mother Nature, including storms and hungry predators. You are in charge, place data collection systems such as camera traps and weather monitors, set up your main base, take care of your dogs and ensure the success of the expedition

some features:
-Base building customization and management :use the expedition members to build and gather resources.
-Dog sled: 4 loyals dogs that will provide swift transportation, you just have to take care of their basic needs.
-Kayak!
-Storms: Storms that get more demanding as days go by, they will test your strategic skills as the leader of your village.
-Working 2 player online co-op
about_the_game:
The main objective in Eternal Winter is to lead an expedition and collect data about this inhospitable island and its ecosystem.

​you will need to face all kind of challenges imposed by Mother Nature, including storms and hungry predators. You are in charge, place data collection systems such as camera traps and weather monitors, set up your main base, take care of your dogs and ensure the success of the expedition

some features:
-Base building customization and management :use the expedition members to build and gather resources.
-Dog sled: 4 loyals dogs that will provide swift transportation, you just have to take care of their basic needs.
-Kayak!
-Storms: Storms that get more demanding as days go by, they will test your strategic skills as the leader of your village.

short_description: Lead an expedition and explore an arctic island full of wildlife. Build and customize your base camp, hunt and gather resources, place data collection systems across the island. Use your kayak to reach icebergs and glaciers. Become a true explorer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4xxx Series w/ 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board chip will work
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 quad core 2.60ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 555/ or 1gb VRAM
  • Sound Card: Anything with Surround capabilites

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Core i5 @ 2.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Core i7 @ 2.7GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: standalone GPU with 1gb VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
